languages.text: [Успокоить молитвой] "Да осветит сияние Императора нам путь сквозь непроглядную тьму, когда, сокрушенные сердцем, мы обращаемся к Его мудрости..."

traits.locale_text: [Успокоить молитвой] "Да осветит сияние Императора нам путь сквозь непроглядную тьму, когда, сокрушенные сердцем, мы обращаемся к Его мудрости..."

languages.text: [Soothe her with prayer] "May the Emperor's radiance illuminate our way through the tenebrous gloom as we that are broken of heart turn to His wisdom..."
languages.original_text: [Успокоить молитвой] "Да осветит сияние Императора нам путь сквозь непроглядную тьму, когда, сокрушенные сердцем, мы обращаемся к Его мудрости..."

traits.locale_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "May the Emperor's radiance illuminate our way through the tenebrous gloom as we who are broken of heart turn to His wisdom..."

[Soothe her with prayer] "May the Emperor's radiance illuminate our way through the tenebrous gloom as we that are broken of heart turn to His wisdom..."

languages.text: ［祈りで彼女をなだめる］「我々が心を痛め、皇帝の英知に立ち返るとき、皇帝の輝きが暗い闇の中を進む我々の道を照らしてくれますように…」
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "May the Emperor's radiance illuminate our way through the tenebrous gloom as we that are broken of heart turn to His wisdom..."

traits.locale_text: ［祈りで彼女をなだめる］「我々が心を痛め、皇帝の英知に立ち返るとき、皇帝の輝きが暗い闇の中を進む我々の道を照らしてくれますように…」

languages.text: [通过祈祷让她冷静下来]“愿帝皇的光辉照亮驱散黑暗，指引我们的道路。我们一筹莫展，需要祂的智慧……”
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "May the Emperor's radiance illuminate our way through the tenebrous gloom as we that are broken of heart turn to His wisdom..."

traits.locale_text: [通过祈祷让她冷静下来]“愿帝皇的光辉照亮驱散黑暗，指引我们的道路。我们一筹莫展，需要祂的智慧……”

languages.text: [Calmarla con una oración] «Que el resplandor del Emperador ilumine nuestro camino a través de la tenebrosa penumbra mientras los que adolecemos de corazón roto recurrimos a Su sabiduría...».
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "May the Emperor's radiance illuminate our way through the tenebrous gloom as we that are broken of heart turn to His wisdom..."

traits.locale_text: [Calmarla con una oración] «Que el resplandor del Emperador ilumine nuestro camino a través de la tenebrosa penumbra mientras los que adolecemos de corazón roto recurrimos a Su sabiduría...».

languages.text: [Ihr durch ein Gebet Linderung verschaffen] "Möge der Glanz des Imperators unseren Weg durch die düstere Finsternis erhellen, wenn wir, deren Herzen gebrochen sind, uns seiner Weisheit zuwenden ..."
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "May the Emperor's radiance illuminate our way through the tenebrous gloom as we that are broken of heart turn to His wisdom..."

traits.locale_text: [Ihr durch ein Gebet Linderung verschaffen] "Möge der Glanz des Imperators unseren Weg durch die düstere Finsternis erhellen, wenn wir, deren Herzen gebrochen sind, uns seiner Weisheit zuwenden ..."

languages.text: [L'apaiser avec une prière] « Que le rayonnement de l'Empereur illumine notre chemin à travers l'obscurité alors que nos cœurs brisés se tournent vers Sa sagesse... »
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "May the Emperor's radiance illuminate our way through the tenebrous gloom as we that are broken of heart turn to His wisdom..."

traits.locale_text: [L'apaiser avec une prière] « Que le rayonnement de l'Empereur illumine notre chemin à travers l'obscurité alors que nos cœurs brisés se tournent vers Sa sagesse... »

languages.text: [Dua ederek Cassia'yı sakinleştir] "Kalbi kırılan bizler, kasvetli karanlıkta yolumuzu bulmak için İmparator'un bilgeliğine sığınırız. İmparator, nuruyla bize yol göstersin..."
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "May the Emperor's radiance illuminate our way through the tenebrous gloom as we that are broken of heart turn to His wisdom..."

traits.locale_text: [Dua ederek Cassia'yı sakinleştir] "Kalbi kırılan bizler kasvetli bir karanlıkta yolumuzu bulmak için İmparator'un bilgeliğine başvurduğumuzda, İmparator nuruyla bize yol göstersin..."
